name: PatientActivation
title: Patient Activation
description: Measure of the person's level of knowledge, skill, and confidence for managing their health and healthcare on a validated scale, e.g., PAM (Business ID: Entry 2742713)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Patient Activation.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an measure of the person's level of knowledge, skill, and confidence for managing their health and healthcare on a validated scale, e.g., pam.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Patient Activation.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Patient Activation.)

contains.display: Parent Patient Activation Measure - 13 [PAM] Parent
When all is said and done, I am the person who is responsible for taking care of my child's health Parent [PAM]
Taking an active role in my child's health care is the most important thing that affects his/her health Parent [PAM]
I am confident I can help prevent or reduce problems associated with my child's health Parent [PAM]
I know what each of my child's prescribed medications do Parent [PAM]
I am confident that I can tell whether I need to go to the doctor or whether I can take care of my child's health problem myself Parent [PAM]
I am confident that I can tell a doctor concerns I have abou my child's health even when he or she does not ask Parent [PAM]
I am confident that I can follow through on medical treatments I need to do for my child at home Parent [PAM]
I understand my child's health problems and what causes them Parent [PAM]
I know what treatments are available for my child's health problems Parent [PAM]
I have been able to help my child maintain (keep up with) lifestyle changes, like eating right or exercising Parent [PAM]
I know how to prevent problems with my child's health Parent [PAM]
I am confident I can figure out solutions when new problems arise with my child's health Parent [PAM]
I am confident that I can help my child maintain lifestyle changes, like eating right and exercising, even during times of stress Parent [PAM]
Parent Patient Activation Measure - 10 [PAM] Parent
When all is said and done, I am responsible for seeing that this person's health is managed properly Caregiver [PAM]
Taking an active role in this person's health care is one of the most important factors in determining her/his health and ability to function Caregiver [PAM]
I am confident that I can take actions that will help prevent or minimize some symptoms or problems associated with this person's health Caregiver [PAM]
I know what each of this person's prescribed medications do Caregiver [PAM]
I am confident that I can tell when this person needs to get medical care and when I can handle the problem myself Caregiver [PAM]
I am confident I can tell a doctor the concerns that I have about this person's health even when he or she does not ask Caregiver [PAM]
I am confident that I can follow through on medical treatments I need to do for this person at home Caregiver [PAM]
I understand the nature and causes of this person's health Caregiver [PAM]
I know the different medical treatment options available for this person's health Caregiver [PAM]
I am able to help this person maintain lifestyle changes (like eating right or exercising) for her/his condition Caregiver [PAM]
I know how to prevent problems with this person's health Caregiver [PAM]
I am confident I can figure out solutions when new situations or problems arise with this person's health Caregiver [PAM]
I am confident I can help this person with lifestyle changes, like diet and exercise, even during times of stress Caregiver [PAM]
Caregiver Patient Activation Measure - 13 [PAM] Caregiver
Caregiver Patient Activation Measure - 10 [PAM] Caregiver
Total score Parent [PAM]
Total score Caregiver [PAM]
